movies.title: The Night Nurse
movies.plot: A private nurse uncovers strange goings-on in the home where she is working.
movies.simplePlot: A private nurse uncovers strange goings-on in the home where she is working.

biography.bio: Davina Whitehouse was born on December 16, 1912 in London, England. She was an actress, known for Dead Alive (1992), The Night Nurse (1978) and Sleeping Dogs (1977). She was married to Archie. She died on December 25, 2002 in Auckland, New Zealand.
biography.name: Davina Whitehouse

biography.bio: Kay Taylor is an actress, known for Picnic à Hanging Rock (1975), The Night Nurse (1978) and Moving On (1974).
biography.name: Kay Taylor

biography.bio: Gary Day was born in 1941 in Christchurch, New Zealand. He is an actor and writer, known for Homicide (1964), Murder call, fréquence meurtre (1997) and Blue Murder (1995).
biography.name: Gary Day

biography.bio: Kate Fitzpatrick was born on October 1, 1947 in Nedlands, Western Australia, Australia. She is an actress, known for Something in the Air (2000), A World Apart (1988) and The Return of Captain Invincible (1983).
biography.name: Kate Fitzpatrick

biography.bio: Reg Gillam is an actor, known for Are You Being Served in Australia? (1980), Between Wars (1974) and The Night Nurse (1978).
biography.name: Reg Gillam

biography.bio: Edward Howell was born on July 15, 1902 in Bromley, Kent, England as Edward Welsford Rowsell Howell. He was an actor, known for Careful, He Might Hear You (1983), The Cars That Eat People (1974) and The Night Nurse (1978). He died on August 20, 1986 in Chatswood, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.
biography.name: Edward Howell

biography.bio: Max Meldrum was born in 1931 in Australia. He was an actor, known for Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde (1986), Age of Consent (1969) and Young Einstein (1988). He died on February 8, 1991.
biography.name: Max Meldrum
